full_summary:
# Supply and Installation of Walk-in Cooler Compressors

## Government of Canada Tender Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (formerly Procurement Strategy and Outreach Canada (PSOC)) invites bids from qualified suppliers for the Supply, Delivery, and Installation of Walk-in Cooler Compressors.

### Tender Details

- **Reference Number**: WS3833624247
- **Bid Solicitation Number**: WS3833624247
- **Bid Due Date**: The Request for Proposal (RFP) was released on January 23, 2023. Bid proposals are due by 2:00 pm ET on February 13, 2023.
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 20, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: June 30, 2023
- **Tender Classification**: Food Preparation Equipment (48101600)
- **Location**: Kingston, ON, Canada

### Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) has identified the need for walk-in coolers to maintain perishable food items at a suitable temperature in various facilities. This tender is intended to provide four walk-in coolers for indoor use, ensuring compliance with all applicable safety standards and regulations. The selected bidder will be required to provide a full system including condensing units, evaporators, compressors, and associated piping and electrical components.

### Criteria for Selection

The selection of the successful Bidder will be based on variations or combinations of the following methods: Best Bid, Rapid Order (Express Process), and Standing Offer. Trade agreements and agreements not included in Appendix A of the solicitation document are also considered.

### Contracting Entity

- **Department**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
- **Contact**: Crystal Denton, Procurement Strategy and Outreach Canada (PSOC) (FSPC)
